Key Match Events: Nick Castellanos had seven hits in 17 at-bats during the NLDS, which included the game-tying home run and walk-off hit in Game 2.
His batting average was an impressive .412 during the four-game series.
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Castellanos expressed frustration but gave credit to the Mets for their performance.
Castellanos mentioned that the Mets are playing really good baseball and acknowledged their improvement over the season.
The Mets will advance to the NLCS for the first time since 2015.
